This silver band is carved with the personal sigils of different individuals, adding one to represent you when you invest it. The ring allows you to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sigil] as an arcane innate cantrip.

Activateâ€”Track Sigil 1 (concentrate, detection)

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect You detect the general direction toward the most recent sigil you created using the ring. This activation fails if the sigil is more than 5 miles away or if there's lead or running water between you and the sigil.
